wikipedia_page.main: James Michael Doyle (born 1 August 1991) is a Scottish footballer who plays for as a defender for Scottish League Two club Queen's Park. Doyle's youth career was spent at Celtic, then Kilmarnock without having any first-team appearances. Doyle has previously played for Alloa Athletic, St Johnstone, Greenock Morton and Queen of the South and Falkirk.

Joe McKee signed for Carlisle United, whilst full-back Michael Doyle joined from St Johnstone.

Jamie McDonagh signed for Greenock Morton in the summer of 2016 as a forward. Though throughout the 2016–17 campaign, McDonagh featured as a right midfielder and right back, due to injuries to Conor Pepper and Michael Doyle. McDonagh left Morton in May 2017 at the expiration of his contract.
